name: 3D Streets of Rage 2
description:
The sequel to the original rumbler is
back and re-mastered in 3D. Slam the
asphalt with bigger, better and totally
devastating attacks. Skull crushing
ex-wrestler Max Thunder joins up with
Axel and Blaze to throw earth
shattering body slams and fist
attacks. New thrasher Skate slices
punks with high speed inline attacks
and spinning jump kicks. Use secret
weapons to bash your way through
gangs of bikers to rescue your friend
and defeat Mr. X.
